sentences.sContent: He forgave his son’s immature behaviour.
sentences.sCn: 他原谅了儿子的幼稚行为。

synos.tran: 不成熟的；未成熟的；粗糙的

remMethod.val: im(不) + mature(成熟的) → 未成熟的

words.tran: 未成熟；粗糙；未臻完美；不完全

trans.tranCn: 不成熟的, 未完全发展的
trans.tranOther: someone who is immature behaves or thinks in a way that is typical of someone much younger – used to show disapproval
